def give_last(arr):
    last_value = arr[0]
    d = 0
    while d < len(arr):
        last_value = arr[d]
        d += 1
    return last_value

def give_first(arr):
    first_value = arr[-1]
    d = len(arr)
    while d > 0:
        d -= 1
        first_value = arr[d]
    return first_value
